text: Nim'ma (jote seruva) visayadalli avaru tumba jipunate toruttare. Avarige enadaru apaya eduradaga avaru nim'medege noda todaguttare. Aga avara kannugalu maranada murcheyu badhisiruvante calisuttiruttave. Apaya duravadodane avaru tam'ma haritavada naligegalinda nim'mannu dusisalarambhisuttare. Satkaryada visayadalli avaru tira jipunaragiruttare. Avaru visvasa ullavaralla. Allahanu avara karmagalannella vyarthagolisiruvanu. Adu allahana mattige sulabhada kelasavagide
